name: unpopularity
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the quality of being disliked by many people: There is no doubt about the deep unpopularity of the tax-reform programme. She is prepared to risk unpopularity by tackling social issues of concern. See
unpopular
More examplesFewer examplesthe president's growing unpopularityDespite his current unpopularity, he plans to stand for election. the widespread unpopularity of the war
